data.text: @CBCEdmonton Watch the data very carefully because people with common sense watch it more thoroughly.
@schtev69 @CBCEdmonton Iceland ended all covid restrictions. They say we have to learn to live with it just like we live with the flu.
@CBCEdmonton Do you not get it by now? Everywhere mandates have dropped now so does Covid as it's on the downslope - was the same on the way up + no mandate can Stop the trajectory. Do better CBC
@CBCEdmonton Watch data? They have never once followed data so that would be yet another lie from @JasonCoppingAB.
@CBCEdmonton Another PlaneDamic😷 coming. Hand on. The #fakenewsmedia is beating around the bush
@CBCEdmonton And wastewater data is always out of date by 5 days or as many as 10 days. A lot can change in a day.
@CBCEdmonton Manufactured data and hospitalization rates?  Really?  Do you think it is fun?
